Package Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Driver class that facilitates the simulation of the transactions between the user and operator and the vending machine. It allows the user to create one and test all its functions and capabilities by accessing the other classes through their instances. It functions as that initiator of all the methods found in each of the classes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Controller()
    Constructor method for the creation of an instance of the Controller class

    AddMoneytoSystem is the method that allows the user to input denominations in the vending machine, increasing the amount of money it possesses

    buyCustom is the method that takes in the quantity of each product from the special vending machine custom form and puts it into an array (Qty)

    buyItem(VendingMachine CurrentM)
    buyItem is the method that allows the user to buy items from the vending machine
    VendingMachine
    buyPremade(VendingMachine CurrentM)
    buyPremade allows the user to purchase a premade item via a function in the vending machine by building the Qty[] array used to determine the amount of items being bought

    collectionManage allows the user to collect/reduce the amount of money inside the vending machine that it can dispense for change

    stockManage(VendingMachine CurrentM)
    stockManage is the method that allows user to increase an item's stock via the methods written in the model which can increase the amount of an item that can be bought later on
    void
    updateTextinBuy()
    updateTextinBuy is the method that updates the quantity, price, and calorie values of each product in BMFrame (Buy Menu) and SVMCFrame (Special Vending Machine Custom) each time it gets called.

  • Method Details

    • CreateVM

      public VendingMachine CreateVM(VendingMachine CurrentM)
      Initiates an instance of the Model.VendingMachine class as well as fill up its slots with predefined items. Whether it is a regular or special variant that can curate products is chosen by the user
      Parameters:
      CurrentM - is the vending machine to be created
      Returns:
      the vending machine that is created

    • AddMoneytoSystem

      public BankNotes AddMoneytoSystem()
      AddMoneytoSystem is the method that allows the user to input denominations in the vending machine, increasing the amount of money it possesses
      Returns:
      the money to be added to the machine

    • updateTransFile

      public void updateTransFile(VendingMachine CurrentM)
      updateTransFile is the method that appends new transaction history into the "TransactionHistory.txt" file every time it gets called.
      Parameters:
      CurrentM - is the vending machine to be created

    • stockManage

      public VendingMachine stockManage(VendingMachine CurrentM)
      stockManage is the method that allows user to increase an item's stock via the methods written in the model which can increase the amount of an item that can be bought later on
      Parameters:
      CurrentM - is the instance of the vending machine being modified
      Returns:
      the modified vending machine

    • priceManage

      Returns:
      the modified vending machine

    • QtyChecker

      public boolean QtyChecker(VendingMachine CurrentM, int[] Qty)
      QtyChecker is the method that checks if the quantity of each item in the custom order is valid
      Parameters:
      CurrentM - is the instance of the vending machine being modified
      Qty - is the array containing the quantity of each item of the custom order
      Returns:
      true if quantity is valid, false if not
